0: The staff were attentive courteous friendly and spoke English
Excellent service for an amazing stay
While the hotel rooms and facilities themselves are top of their class already what impressed us most is the level of impeccable services provided by the entire MO staff team
Food in all the restaurants was excellent and in the eveningI would relax in the piano bar with a cigar from their extensive cigar menu
Everything in the Mandarin Oriental Tokyo was excellent
in addition they provided suggestions to purchase souvenirs and Japanese sweets
Location is perfect for visiting anywhere in Tokyo 5 mins walk to the metro station
The Front Desk and Concierge people were extremely helpful and professional and went beyond what was asked from them
2nd stay with MO enjoyed the location good size room and bathroom with magnificent view quiet area with many traditional shops restaurants and shopping
But to conclude we are really glad that we stayed here

By far the most amazing hotel experience I have had in over 25 years of travel
There was a direct aces to the hotel from the Mitsukoshimae subway station
For example an 80min massage its about 400 US which seems a bit much to me
They replied promptly each time and although I felt we were the ones who were imposing on their time they were always cordial and nice about the whole thing
I did find it odd that hotel guests are not allowed to use the spa facilities and this property had a small gym and no pool
